TEXT.TITLE: MGM/UA <MGM> SETS PACT WITH JAPANESE GROUP
TEXT.BODY: MGM/UA Communications Co said it signed an agreement with CST Communications Co for the purpose of financing American motion picture projects. CST is an American corporation formed by C. Itoh and Co Ltd <CITT.T>, Suntory Ltd and Tokyo Broadcasting Systems Inc <TBRS.T>. The company did not detail the agreement. Reuter
